alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 4:27PM MDT until July 25 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL EL PASO COUNTY... At 426 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Fort Carson to Colorado Springs, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Colorado Springs, Fountain, Stratmoor, Fort Carson, Security, Peterson AFB, Security-Widefield and Cimarron Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
